content: stocking hat for gnomes pirates and santas © 2016 rian anderson 4 sizes toddler to adult pattern for an easy stocking hat in 4 sizes to fit a toddler up to adult size the instructions are for wide stripes but this can easily be changed add a pompom if you like this pattern would also make a santa hat for christmas time if you made the brim wider in a fluffy yarn see end of pattern for suggestions stocking hat 1 to fit ages guideline only head sizes vary widely measure to be sure toddler 3 - 9 yrs 10 yrs - teen adult measurements cms head 46 50 55 59 hat circumference 40 44 48 52 height brim to point 50 55 61 66 note hats are made smaller than head measurement to keep them in place materials in grams in dk / 8 ply yarn approx 95 - 105 m per 50 gms ball colour a green in sample 45 50 65 75 colour b blue in sample 35 40 50 60 requirements gauge/gauge 1 pair 4 mm us 6 needles 21 sts 28 row to 10 cm in stocking stitch on 4 mm 1 pair 3 5 mm us 4 needles us 6 needles using 8 ply /dk yarn tapestry needle for sewing seam before you begin - check that your gauge is 2 stitch markers correct in order to obtain an accurate measurement work a gauge swatch of 27 sts and abbreviations read before starting 34 row measure the central 10 cm square if you work have fewer sts than the required gauge use cast on cable method = make a slip loop for the smaller needles or your hat will be too big if you first st then knit it and slip the st on to the left have too many sts use bigger needles or your hat needle place right needle between last 2 sts to will be too small adjust the size of needles used for make next st instead of into the stitch as if to knit the rib accordingly k = knit p = purl note smallest size pattern written first with other st = stitch sizes in brackets stocking stitch = knit right side row purl wrong side row k2tog = knit 2 sts together decreases a st with a right slant ssk = slip 1 st as if to knit it twice separately place left needle purlwise into the 2 slipped sts in front of right needle knit both sts together decreases a st with a left slant repeat = repeat stocking hat 2 stocking hat wrong side or a mattress / ladder st will work with 3 5 mm us 3 needles and 8 ply/dk in colour equally well a cast on 84 92 100 108 sts using the cable you can add a pom-pom to the end if you wish method if you don t have a pom-pom maker row 1 * k2 p2** repeat from* to
